import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { myOrderthunk } from "../reduxstore/thunk" function Myorders(props) { const history = useHistory(); useEffect(() => { props.dispatch(myOrderthunk()) }, []) function shopping() { history.push("/") } const cakeorderlist = props.myordercakes.map((each, index) => (
{each.name}
{each.price}Rs
{each.quantity}
{each.quantity * each.price}Rs
) ) return( <>

YOUR ORDERS

Shopping Cart

{props.myordercakes.length} Orders
{props.myordercakes.length === 0 &&

NO ORDER

} {cakeorderlist}
) } export default connect(function (state, props) { console.log(">>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>nayana",state) return { myordercakes: state["myOrderreducer"]["myordercakes"] || [] } })(Myorders)
